articles.title: Georgia Becomes First US State To Pass Resolution Condemning Hinduphobia - NDTV
articles.description: US' Georgia Assembly has passed a resolution condemning Hinduphobia, making it the first American state to take such a legislative measure.
articles.content:
United States' Georgia legislature passed a resolution condemning Hinduphobia. (Representational)
